value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    customers {
        INT customer_id PK
        VARCHAR(20) customer_code UK
        VARCHAR(100) name
        VARCHAR(100) furigana
        ENUM gender
        DATE birth_date
        INT age
        VARCHAR(100) organization_name
        VARCHAR(100) representative_name
        VARCHAR(50) job_title
        VARCHAR(10) postal_code
        VARCHAR(200) address1
        VARCHAR(200) address2
        VARCHAR(100) email
        VARCHAR(20) phone
        TEXT notes
        BOOLEAN warning_flag
    }
    subscriptions {
        INT subscription_id PK
        INT customer_id FK
        VARCHAR(20) contract_no
        DATE contract_date
        DATE initial_register_date
        VARCHAR(50) field_category
        VARCHAR(20) product_code FK
        VARCHAR(20) start_issue_no
        VARCHAR(20) end_issue_no
        INT total_issues
        INT sent_issues
        INT remaining_issues
        VARCHAR(20) last_sent_issue_no
        BOOLEAN continuation_flag
        VARCHAR(50) application_method
        VARCHAR(50) payment_method
        VARCHAR(50) contract_pattern
        DATE expected_payment_date
        DATE confirmed_payment_date
        VARCHAR(50) cancellation_type
        BOOLEAN gift_shipping_flag
        BOOLEAN renewal_notice_flag
    }
    pricing {
        INT pricing_id PK
        INT subscription_id FK
        DECIMAL set_price
        INT set_quantity
        DECIMAL total_amount
        DECIMAL tax_amount
        DECIMAL tax_inclusive_total
        VARCHAR(50) warehouse_info
    }
    billing_addresses {
        INT billing_id PK
        INT customer_id FK
        VARCHAR(20) billing_code UK
        VARCHAR(100) billing_name
        VARCHAR(100) organization_name
        VARCHAR(100) representative_name
        VARCHAR(10) postal_code
        VARCHAR(200) address1
        VARCHAR(200) address2
        VARCHAR(20) phone
    }
    products {
        VARCHAR(20) product_code PK
        VARCHAR(100) product_name
        TEXT product_description
        DECIMAL unit_price
        DECIMAL tax_rate
    }
    customers ||--o{ subscriptions : "has subscriptions"
    customers ||--o{ billing_addresses : "has billing addresses"
    subscriptions ||--|{ pricing : "has pricing details"
    subscriptions }o--|| products : "belongs to product"
